ItemTooltips.blink: Gives great mobility that can be used to catch opponents who are out of range or to escape. Makes Shadow Demon very slippery when combined with Force Staff.
ItemTooltips.boots: Early move speed to secure runes.
ItemTooltips.magic_wand: A Magic Wand can help against opponents who frequently use abilities against you. The Wand can be argued to be optional in some match-ups.
ItemTooltips.ghost: A good defensive item if Shadow Demon is being focused by carries during team fights. Be careful of magic damage while you are in Ghost Form.
ItemTooltips.bottle: The starting items allow you to have a Bottle delivered to you right before the two minute mark if you are able to get most of your last hits.
ItemTooltips.phase_boots: Active allows you to check runes or gank lanes faster. Damage it provides helps you with last hits and denies.
ItemTooltips.mekansm: If no one else on your team has one this is a great pick up. Active gives area of effect healing and armor buff which can decide a team fight.
ItemTooltips.pipe: Active can save you and team mates from magic damage. The item itself give you substantial health regeneration and magic resistance.
ItemTooltips.sheepstick: Active can disable a dangerous carry on their team. Item itself gives every stat that Shadow Demon could want.
ItemTooltips.force_staff: Great tool for escaping or attacking. (Getting out of a dangerous opponent's range, pushing yourself to catch an enemy, etc.)
ItemTooltips.necronomicon: Active adds pushing power while the item itself gives good stats to Shadow Demon. Note that LVL 3 Necronomicon gives an ally that can detect stealth and the ranged ally has a mana burn ability.
ItemTooltips.invis_sword: The active can be used offensively or defensively. For example: engage on someone who is farming alone or push a tower hard and walk away when someone shows up. In both cases be careful of stealth detection.
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots: Early game the active helps sustain your mana in lane. Later your allies benefit from the active as well.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: Good stats for you while giving a passive and active that benefits your team. Note that buying the recipe again will refresh the drum's charges if needed.

AbilityTooltips.shadow_demon_disruption: Be careful not to disrupt your team using this skill at inopportune times.
AbilityTooltips.shadow_demon_soul_catcher: Note the spell targets a random unit in a circle. Try to catch a unit alone or at the edge of the circle.
AbilityTooltips.shadow_demon_shadow_poison: This skill can be used to scout ahead since the projectile reveals the fog of war.
AbilityTooltips.shadow_demon_shadow_poison_release: Use if Soul Catcher will run out before Shadow Poison expires if the target might escape alive.
AbilityTooltips.shadow_demon_demonic_purge: While good for dealing damage and slowing a high priority target, remember this skill removes positive buffs.
